venue.name: Bear and Grill Restaurants in Orange

item.description: Sure, Memorial Day weeked isn't actually until May 27-30.... but why wait! Let's get in the holiday weekend mood with an early celerbation! Come listen, have a beverage or two and relax while  I play my classic selection of mostly mellow acoustic rock. I start playing at 5:30, but there's no reason you can't get there a little arly and settle in.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for us in the bar area

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!

item.name: Start Memorial Day a weeke early when The Captain Rocks Happy Hour
